item.title: what is gpg
item.description: also called gnu privacy guard this is a key which helps to encrypt and decript files there are 2 types of gpg keys; private : unlocks everything you lock with that public : you send to other people gpg keys expire! so you need to generate them once or twice a year how to generate a gpg key first generate personal key: gpg --full-gen-key choose RSA and RSA
